cause.description:
We are providing shelter to Kigali women who want to get out of prostitution. We help them find work, learn to read and write and to be self sufficient. Visit our site at www.roseofdignity.com for more info.
1. Restoring Hearts
2. Overcoming Troubles
3. Saving Souls
4. Empowerin Women
cause.mission: Help Women in Prostitution in Rwanda
cause.name: Rose Of Dignity
